DOC.brief_summary: A randomized , double blind , placebo-controlled pilot study efficacy Passiflora incarnata L. acute stressful situation
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Efficacy Pascoflair Acute Stressful Situation ( TSST )
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized , double-blind , placebo-controlled , single-center study During Visit 1 study information inform consent form hand . After study inclusion Visit 2 , participant assign one two group random receive test product ( either Pascoflair® placebo tablet ) . The 3rd visit include completion questionnaire regard wellbeing Trier Social Stress Test .
DOC.criteria: Provide write informed consent ; Healthy male female subject Nonsmoker ; Age 25 45 year ; BMI ≥ 19 ≤ 30 kg/m2 Any known allergy test substance ; Any known addiction drug , alcohol positive result drug screen test ; Any serious general illness , ongoing within last 12 month ; Any febrile illness ( > 24 hr . ) within 7 day prior treatment ; Any antibiotic last four week study inclusion ; Diabetes mellitus ; Known heart disease , hypertension , kidney disease , significant respiratory disease , epilepsy , rheumatoid arthritis ; Known immunologic infectious disease ( e.g . hepatitis , tuberculosis , HIV AIDS ) could place subject risk interfere accuracy study result ; Pregnancy lactating ; Current participation participation type clinical study past week ; Current past participation TSST study ; Employees Sponsor CRO ; Any medication , opinion Investigator likely affect response treatment ; Clinically relevant abnormality physical examination , vital sign , clinical chemistry , haematology judge Investigator ; Any condition Investigator duly assign representative believe may affect ability individual complete study interpretation study result .
